00064   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListMachineOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00065   {
00066     std::string sqlListofMachinesWithJointure = "SELECT machineid, name, site, machine.status, lang, description, userid "
00067     " from machine, description, account, users where machine.nummachineid = description.machine_nummachineid "
00068     " and account.machine_nummachineid=machine.nummachineid and account.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00069 
00070     std::string sqlListofMachinesIntial =  sqlRequest;
00071 
00072     size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00073     size_t machineIdSize = options->getMachineId().size();
00074     bool isListAll = options->isListAllmachine();
00075 
00076     if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && userIdSize!=0) {
00077       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00078       throw e;
00079     }
00080 
00081     if(!isListAll) {
00082        sqlRequest = sqlListofMachinesWithJointure;
00083        addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00084     }
00085 
00086     //The admin option
00087     if(userIdSize!=0) {
00088       //To check if the user id is correct
00089       checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00090 
00091       sqlRequest = sqlListofMachinesWithJointure;
00092       addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00093     }
00094 
00095     if(machineIdSize!=0) {
00096       //To check if the machine id is correct
00097       checkMachineId(options->getMachineId());
00098 
00099       if(!isListAll && userIdSize==0) {
00100          sqlRequest=sqlListofMachinesIntial;
00101       }
00102       addOptionRequest("machineid", options->getMachineId(), sqlRequest);
00103     }
00104 
00105  }

00113  UMS_Data::ListMachines* list() {
00114     DatabaseResult *ListofMachines;
00115     std::string sqlListofMachines = "SELECT machineid, name, site, status, lang, description from machine, description "
00116     "where machine.nummachineid = description.machine_nummachineid";
00117 
00118     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00119     std::vector<std::string> results;
00120     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00121     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListMachines();
00122 
00123     //Creation of the object user
00124     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00125     userServer.init();
00126     //if the user exists
00127     if (userServer.exist()) {
00128 
00129       //To process options
00130       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofMachines);
00131 
00132       ListofMachines = mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListofMachines.c_str());
00133       if (ListofMachines->getNbTuples() != 0){
00134         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofMachines->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00135           results.clear();
00136           results = ListofMachines->get(i);
00137           ii = results.begin();
00138           UMS_Data::Machine_ptr machine = ecoreFactory->createMachine();
00139           machine->setMachineId(*ii);
00140           machine->setName(*(++ii));
00141           machine->setSite(*(++ii));
00142           machine->setStatus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00143           machine->setLanguage(*(++ii));
00144           machine->setMachineDescription(*(++ii));
00145 
00146           mlistObject->getMachines().push_back(machine);
00147         }
00148       }
00149 
00150     } else {
00151       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00152       throw e;
00153     }
00154     return mlistObject;
00155   }
